name: Blight-Touched Monastic
traits:
Corrupted Fist: Unarmed strikes deal an additional 3 (1d6) necrotic damage.

Blighted Aura: Creatures within 10 feet take 5 (1d10) necrotic damage at the start of their turn unless they succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw.
actions:
Multiattack: The monastic makes two unarmed strike attacks.

Unarmed Strike: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage plus 3 (1d6) necrotic damage.

Flurry of Corruption (Recharge 5-6): Each creature within 5 feet must succeed on a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw or take 9 (2d8) necrotic damage.

name: Blight Cultist Scout
traits:
Guerrilla Tactics: The scout has advantage on attack rolls against creatures that havenâ€™t acted yet in combat.

Blight Infusion: Weapon attacks deal an additional 3 (1d6) necrotic damage.
actions:
Multiattack: The scout makes two melee or ranged attacks.

Scimitar: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage plus 3 (1d6) necrotic damage.

Shortbow: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) necrotic damage.

Blighted Net (Recharge 5-6): Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. On a hit, the target is restrained and takes 3 (1d6) necrotic damage at the start of its turn. The net can be destroyed (AC 10, 10 HP).

name: Blightcaller's Envoy
traits:
Blighted Spellcasting: The envoy is a 7th-level spellcaster. Spellcasting ability is Wisdom (save DC 15, +7 to hit with spell attacks). Prepared spells include:
Cantrips (Druidcraft, Infestation, Thorn Whip);
1st level (Entangle, Thunderwave);
2nd level (Spike Growth, Lesser Restoration);
3rd level (Blight, Call Lightning); 4th level (Ice Storm).

Corrupted Nature: Advantage on saving throws against magical effects from beasts or plants.

Necrotic Pulse (Recharge 5-6): Releases necrotic energy. All creatures within 10 feet must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or take 10 (3d6) necrotic damage.
actions:
Corrupted Quarterstaff: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) necrotic damage.

Summon Blighted Minions (1/Day): Summons two Blight-Touched Wolves or one Blight-Touched Monastic within 30 feet. Minions act immediately after the envoy.
